mission: Verify admin-specific MT Ocean darker palette, data visualizations, dark mode

issues: No admin-specific darker palette defined in theme system
All pages use standard MT Ocean colors from index.css
No differentiation between admin and user-facing pages
Missing deeper blues/teals for admin context
No CSS variables for admin-specific color scheme
Charts use generic purple (#8b5cf6) and blue (#0070f3)
Hardcoded chart colors instead of CSS variables
CSS --chart-1 through --chart-5 exist but not utilized
Missing turquoise/teal/cyan in visualizations
AdminReportsPage, AnalyticsPage have non-ocean colors
Recharts XAxis/YAxis use hardcoded stroke='#888888'
No dynamic stroke colors for dark/light mode
Charts don't reference theme context
Missing dark mode color variables in chart components
Tables lack dark mode specific styling
No useTranslation() hooks found
No t() translation functions
All text hardcoded in English
Missing translation keys for admin UI
No language switching capability
Inconsistent layout patterns across pages
Mix of PageLayout, AdminLayout, and custom implementations
Some pages lack structured layout wrapper
Hero sections vary in implementation

critical_findings: Zero admin-specific darker ocean palette implementation
Majority of charts (83%) use non-ocean generic colors
Complete absence of dark mode theme awareness in visualizations
No internationalization across entire admin interface

AdminDashboard.tsx.notes: Basic dashboard, uses shadcn components with standard colors

AdminDashboardPage.tsx.notes: Moderation queue, custom layout, standard colors

AdminAnalyticsPage.tsx.notes: Uses PageLayout, some chart variables, needs ocean colors

AdminContentModerationDetailPage.tsx.notes: Uses AdminLayout, detail view for reports

AdminUsersPage.tsx.notes: Hero section with custom layout, user list

AdminReportsPage.tsx.notes: Charts with hardcoded colors, needs ocean palette

AdminSettingsPage.tsx.notes: Hero section, tabs for settings categories

ReportContentPage.tsx.notes: Form page with hero section, report submission

ReportUserPage.tsx.notes: Form page with hero section, user reporting

ESADashboardPage.tsx.notes: PageLayout, hero, agent stats, partial ocean colors

MonitoringPage.tsx.notes: PageLayout, platform monitoring, charts need dark mode

AnalyticsPage.tsx.notes: Hero section, charts with hardcoded purple/blue

AgentCommunicationsPage.tsx.notes: Hero section, H2AC protocol, agent messaging

AgentTasksPage.tsx.notes: Hero section, task management, standard colors

immediate_actions.action: Define admin-specific darker ocean palette in index.css
immediate_actions.details: Create CSS variables for admin pages: --admin-background, --admin-card, --admin-primary with deeper blues/teals

immediate_actions.action: Update all chart colors to use MT Ocean palette
immediate_actions.details: Replace hardcoded #8b5cf6 and #0070f3 with --chart-1 through --chart-5 CSS variables

immediate_actions.action: Implement dark mode for chart visualizations
immediate_actions.details: Use theme context or CSS variables for XAxis/YAxis stroke colors instead of hardcoded values

immediate_actions.action: Add i18n to all admin pages
immediate_actions.details: Implement useTranslation() hooks and create translation keys for all admin UI text
Use PageLayout consistently across all admin pages, remove custom hero implementations where appropriate

implementation_examples.change: Add admin-specific darker palette CSS variables in both :root and .dark sections
Replace stroke='#888888' with stroke='hsl(var(--muted-foreground))' for theme awareness
Import useTranslation, wrap text in t() functions, create translation keys

audit_methodology: Direct code inspection of all 18 admin pages, theme configuration files, and CSS variable definitions
tools_used: read tool for file content analysis
Manual code review of component implementations
